INSERT ALL INTO iclass ( CLASS_ID, CLASS_TITLE, CLASS_NEED, CLASS_LEVEL, CLASS_STARTDATE, CLASS_ENDDATE, CLASS_TIME, CLASS_TOTALMEMBER, CLASS_PRICE, CLASS_GOAL, CLASS_CONTENT, CLASS_TRAINERINFO, CLASS_IMAGE, CLASS_STATE, CATEGORY_ID, USER_ID ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(class_id), MAX(class_id)) + 1 FROM iclass), #{classTitle}, #{classNeed}, #{classLevel}, #{classStartDate}, #{classEndDate}, #{classTime}, #{classTotalMember}, #{classPrice}, #{classGoal}, #{classContent}, #{classTrainerInfo}, #{classImage}, 'show', 2, #{iUserVO.userId} )
INTO EXERCISE_DATE ( EXERCISE_DATE, CLASS_ID ) VALUES ( #{date.exerciseDate}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(class_id), MAX(class_id)) + 1 FROM iclass) )
INTO EXERCISE_KIND ( EXERCISE_KIND, CLASS_ID ) VALUES ( #{kind.exerciseKind}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(class_id), MAX(class_id)) + 1 FROM iclass) )

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ic.*, iu.user_nickname FROM iclass ic, iuser iu WHERE ic.user_id = iu.user_id and ic.category_id = 2 and ic.class_enddate >= sysdate and class_state = 'show' ORDER BY ic.class_like DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 2
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM iclass WHERE iclass.category_id = 2 and class_enddate >= sysdate and class_state = 'show'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, classlist.* FROM ( SELECT ic.class_id, ic.class_totalmember, ic.class_image, iu.user_nickname, ic.class_title, ic.class_startdate, ic.class_enddate, ic.class_time, ic.class_level, exercise_kind, exercise_date, ic.class_price FROM iclass ic, iuser iu, ( SELECt exkind.*, exdate.exercise_date FROM ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_kind, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_kind DESC) AS exercise_kind FROM exercise_kind GROUP BY class_id ) exkind, ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_date, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_date DESC) AS exercise_date FROM exercise_date GROUP BY class_id ) exdate WHERE exkind.class_id = exdate.class_id ) exercise WHERE ic.class_id = exercise.class_id and ic.category_id = 2 and class_enddate >= sysdate and ic.user_id = iu.user_id and ic.class_state = 'show' ) classlist WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM buy, pay, iclass WHERE buy.buy_id = pay.buy_id and buy.user_id = #{userId} and pay.pay_state = 'pay' and buy.class_id = iclass.class_id and iclass.category_id = 2 and iclass.class_state = 'show' and class_enddate >= sysdate

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, clsre.* FROM ( SELECT iclass.class_id FROM buy, pay, iclass WHERE buy.buy_id = pay.buy_id and buy.user_id = #{userId} and pay.pay_state = 'pay' and buy.class_id = iclass.class_id and iclass.category_id = 2 and iclass.class_state = 'show' ) buyre, ( SELECT cls.*, iuser.user_nickname FROM iuser, ( SELECT ic.class_id, ic.user_id, ic.class_totalmember, ic.class_image, ic.class_title, ic.class_startdate, ic.class_time, ic.class_level, ic.class_enddate, ic.class_price, exercise.exercise_kind, exercise.exercise_date FROM iclass ic, ( SELECT exkind.*, exdate.exercise_date FROM ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_kind, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_kind DESC) AS exercise_kind FROM exercise_kind GROUP BY class_id ) exkind, ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_date, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_date DESC) AS exercise_date FROM exercise_date GROUP BY class_id ) exdate WHERE exkind.class_id = exdate.class_id ) exercise WHERE ic.class_id = exercise.class_id and ic.category_id = 2 and ic.class_state = 'show' and class_enddate >= sysdate ) cls WHERE cls.user_id = iuser.user_id ) clsre WHERE clsre.class_id = buyre.class_id and ROWNUM <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT count(li.class_id) FROM iclass, likelist li WHERE iclass.class_id = li.class_id and iclass.class_state = 'show' and class_enddate >= sysdate and li.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, clss.* FROM likelist li, ( SELECT cls.*, iu.user_nickname FROM iuser iu, ( SELECT ic.class_id, ic.user_id, ic.class_totalmember, ic.class_image, ic.class_title, ic.class_startdate, ic.class_enddate, ic.class_time, ic.class_level, ic.class_price, ic.class_state, exercise.exercise_kind, exercise.exercise_date FROM iclass ic, ( SELECT exkind.*, exdate.exercise_date FROM ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_kind, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_kind DESC) AS exercise_kind FROM exercise_kind GROUP BY class_id ) exkind, ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_date, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_date DESC) AS exercise_date FROM exercise_date GROUP BY class_id ) exdate WHERE exkind.class_id = exdate.class_id ) exercise WHERE ic.class_id = exercise.class_id and ic.category_id = 2 and ic.class_state = 'show' and class_enddate >= sysdate ) cls WHERE cls.user_id = iu.user_id ) clss WHERE clss.class_id = li.class_id and class_state = 'show' and clss.class_enddate >= sysdate and li.user_id = #{userId} and ROWNUM <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, classlist.* FROM ( SELECT ic.class_id, ic.class_totalmember, ic.class_image, iu.user_nickname, ic.class_title, ic.class_startdate, ic.class_enddate, ic.class_time, ic.class_level, exercise_kind, exercise_date, ic.class_price FROM iclass ic, iuser iu, ( SELECt exkind.*, exdate.exercise_date FROM ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_kind, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_kind DESC) AS exercise_kind FROM exercise_kind GROUP BY class_id ) exkind, ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_date, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_date DESC) AS exercise_date FROM exercise_date GROUP BY class_id ) exdate WHERE exkind.class_id = exdate.class_id ) exercise WHERE ic.class_id = exercise.class_id and ic.category_id = 2 and class_enddate < sysdate and ic.user_id = iu.user_id ) classlist WHERE ROWNUM <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount}
